attributes.action: Do not allow any asylum seekers from the closed "jungle" settlement to settle in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a ridiculous proposal by the UN that we take some, the last time we did when a camp was closed we had many who did not want to work and cost 100,000 pound a day to tax payers. The international treaty made with the UN states asylum seekers must claim asylum in the first democratic country they arrive in so why do we constantly take on illegally claiming asylum seekers, PUT A STOP TO IT ONCE AND FOR ALL!
